prompt: Design a minimalist profile page with a clean white background and subtle gray accents. Create a card-based layout with rounded corners and soft shadow containing all profile elements. Position a small circular avatar (80px) at the top left of the card, with name and email aligned to the right of the avatar. Below the user info, add a horizontal divider line. Include three text buttons (Edit Profile, Settings, Logout) arranged horizontally at the bottom of the card with subtle gray text and no background. The entire card should be centered on the screen with generous white space around it.
